alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Benson, southwestern Grand Forks, southern Nelson, Griggs, northwestern Barnes, Eddy and western Steele Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms with a history of producing strong gusts in excess of 50 mph along a line extending from near Whitman to near Jessie to near Spiritwood Lake. Movement was east at 45 mph. Gusty winds may occur without any rainfall or lightning ahead of thunderstorms. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jessie around 135 AM CDT. Cooperstown around 140 AM CDT. Leal around 150 AM CDT. Dazey, Sharon and Finley around 155 AM CDT. Walum around 200 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Benson; Eddy; Grand Forks; Griggs; Nelson; Steele
